SELECT org.*, CASE WHEN t.project_count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t.project_count END AS project_count FROM fd_organization org LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.organization_id AS org_id, COUNT(p.id) AS project_count FROM fd_organization o JOIN fd_project p ON o.id = p.organization_id GROUP BY p.organization_id ) t ON org.id = t.org_id WHERE 1=1
AND org.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{organization.name}),'%')
AND org.code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{organization.code}),'%')
AND org.is_enabled = #{organization.enabled}
AND( org.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR org.code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )

SELECT DISTINCT fd_organization.* FROM fd_organization INNER JOIN iam_member_role ON fd_organization.id = iam_member_role.source_id AND iam_member_role.source_type = 'organization' INNER JOIN iam_role ON iam_role.is_enabled = 1 and iam_role.id = iam_member_role.role_id WHERE iam_member_role.member_id = #{memberId}
AND fd_organization.is_enabled = 1

SELECT DISTINCT fd_organization.* FROM fd_organization WHERE id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT fp.organization_id FROM fd_project fp INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.source_id=fp.id INNER JOIN iam_role ON iam_role.is_enabled = 1 and iam_role.id = imr.role_id AND imr.source_type='project' WHERE imr.member_id=#{memberId} )
AND fd_organization.is_enabled = 1

SELECT fd_organization.id, fd_organization.code, fd_organization.name, fd_organization.is_enabled, fd_project.id AS project_id, fd_project.name AS project_name, fd_project.code AS project_code, fd_project.organization_id, fd_project.is_enabled AS project_is_enabled FROM fd_organization LEFT JOIN fd_project ON fd_organization.id = fd_project.organization_id WHERE fd_project.is_enabled = 1

SELECT o.id, o.name, o.code, o.is_enabled, ir.id AS role_id, ir.name AS role_name, ir.code AS role_code, ir.is_enabled AS role_is_enabled FROM fd_organization o INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT source_id FROM iam_member_role WHERE member_id = #{id} AND member_type = 'user' AND source_type = 'organization' ORDER BY source_id ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{size} ) t ON o.id = t.source_id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.source_id = o.id LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id}
AND ( o.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR o.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )

SELECT o.id, o.name, o.code, o.is_enabled, ir.id AS role_id, ir.name AS role_name, ir.code AS role_code, ir.is_enabled AS role_is_enabled FROM fd_organization o INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT source_id FROM iam_member_role WHERE member_id = #{id} AND member_type = 'user' AND source_type = 'organization' ORDER BY source_id ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{size} ) t ON o.id = t.source_id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.source_id = o.id LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id}
AND ( o.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR o.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
